name: tERRASTORIES
description: An open-source application for mapping place-based oral histories

SDGs.evidenceText: Terrastories pertains to Target 4.7 insofar as the application promotes young learners, in particular from Indigenous communities, to gain appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture's contribution to sustainable development, in their own language and using materials that directly relate to their lands and communities.

Terrastories pertains to Target 11.4 insofar as the application serves as a resource for protecting a community's intangible cultural heritage, in the form of oral histories and traditional knowledge about the lands.
